sentences.sContent: Millions of words have been written about the introduction of the euro.
sentences.sCn: 已有上百万的文字论及欧元的引入。

synos.tran: 欧元（欧盟的统一货币单位）

phrases.pCn: n. 欧洲迪斯尼（位于法国巴黎郊外的大型主题公园）

trans.tranOther: The euro is a unit of currency that is used by several member countries of the European Union
